message.raw:
Bugfix: NameErrors in properties.py that would break if vlenstrings are used
in connection tables (which we may switch to at some point), and connections.py
not converting numpy strigs correctly (in Python 3, np.str_ is unicode, not bytes).

message:
Bugfix: NameErrors in properties.py that would break if vlenstrings are used
in connection tables (which we may switch to at some point), and connections.py
not converting numpy strigs correctly (in Python 3, np.str_ is unicode, not bytes).
